availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Gathright (Jefferson County, KY, merchant and flour dealer)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, merchant and flour dealer. Virginia native. Son of John Gathright and Mantie Redford Gathright. Married to Rebecca Baker Fible Gathright in Oldham County on September 19, 1843. Father of Martha "Mattie" Gathright. Married to Elizabeth Gathright. Father of Ellen Gathright. Constable in Oldham County in 1850. Partner in Gathright & Ford with Albert Ford in Louisville in 1859. Partner in Lyons & Gathright with James F. Lyons in Louisville in 1859. Merchant in Louisville in 1860. Signed a petition as a flour dealer in May 1861 to appoint W. G. Timberlake as flour inspector.

ab.bibl:
